job.title: Software Design Engineer
job.description:
Hunter Engineering Company, a global leader in the development and manufacturing of computer-based automotive service equipment.      We are currently seeking a R&D Engineer- Software Design for our R&D operations.      Founded in 1946, Hunter has a history of product ingenuity and growth and has been a worldwide market leader for decades. Our computer-based products set the quality and technological standard in the industry. Hunter Engineering Company offers state-of-the-art automotive service equipment such as wheel alignment systems, wheel balancers, tire changers, lift racks, and brake testers.      Job Summary      We are looking for a Software Design Engineer to design and develop machine vision based products with emphasis on software development.      Responsibilities     -  Perform new product research and conceptual design as member of our design team    
  -  Develop, implement, and test vision based software algorithms    
  -  Support development of application level software    
  -  Support further development of existing products as needed    
  -  Support development of factory test fixtures as required       
Qualifications     -  Bachelor’s of Science degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science    
  -  Experience with Microsoft Visual Studio is preferred    
  -  Knowledgeable in matrix algebra, 3D perspective geometry, and optimization algorithms    
  -  Experience developing application level software including screen design and user interface design    
  -  Experience with working in a multiple developer team environment with configuration management and defect tracking tools is preferred    
  -  Experience in developing code for embedded systems is also desired    
  -  Experience developing software in C, C++, using a Windows-based development environment is required       
Preferred Experience     -  C#    
  -  Azure    
  -  Electron & Angular    
  -  .NET Core, React, & TypeScript    
  -  JSON    
  -  RESTful APIs    
  -  Version Control: Team Foundation Server and/or Git
